about_the_game:
🐾 Welcome to "Dog" - The Ultimate Canine Clicker Adventure with Rare Item Drops!


Dive into the world of "Dog," where every click brings you closer to uncovering rare and valuable treasures! This addictive clicker game isn't just about puppy love – it's a thrilling hunt for the most coveted canine collectibles on Steam.

🦴 Key Features:


  • Click and Collect: Every click not only brings joy to virtual puppers but also increases your chances of finding rare items!
  • Exciting Item Rarity System: Discover common, uncommon, rare, and legendary dog-themed items with varying drop rates.
  • Steam Inventory Integration: Earn unique, tradable items that become part of your Steam inventory.
  • Timed Drops: Wag your tail with excitement as you earn special items every 60 minutes of playtime!

💎 Unleash the Thrill of the Hunt!


In "Dog," the real excitement comes from the chance to uncover incredibly rare items. Here's what makes our item drop system so pawsome:

  • Varied Rarity Levels: From common Chew Toys to the legendary Diamond Collar, each item has its own drop rate.
  • Capsule System: Some of the rarest items come in special "Sticker Capsules" that require keys to open, adding an extra layer of anticipation.
  • Holo and Foil Variants: Certain items come in special Holo or Foil versions, making them even more valuable and sought-after.

🏆 Why "Dog" Stands Out in the Pack


  • Unique Economy: Build your own puppy-powered marketplace by collecting, trading, and selling rare items.
  • Community-Driven: Join a passionate community of collectors always on the hunt for the next big find.
  • Regular Updates: New breeds, items, and features keep the collecting experience fresh and exciting.

🎁 Start Your Collection Now!


Whether you're a casual clicker or a dedicated rare item hunter, "Dog" offers an irresistible blend of simple fun and thrilling discoveries. Will you be the lucky player to uncover the mythical Golden Bone or the coveted Diamond Collar?

Remember, in "Dog," every click brings you closer to that next amazing find. So what are you waiting for? Start clicking, start collecting, and let the puppy love (and rare item drops) begin!

Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 125 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: Any

  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: Any
  • Additional Notes: Setzt 64-Bit-Prozessor und -Betriebssystem voraus

short_description: The ultimate idle clicker game! Tap to collect adorable pups, upgrade your canine companions, and build a thriving dog park empire. Earn tradable Steam items every 40 minutes of play. Join thousands in this free, paw-some adventure. Start your doggy journey now!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Afrikaans*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Azerbaijani*, Bangla*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bosnian*, Catalan*, Cherokee*, Croatian*, Dari*, Estonian*, Filipino*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Hausa*, Hebrew*, Hindi*, Icelandic*, Igbo*, Irish*, K'iche'*, Kannada*, Kazakh*, Khmer*, Kinyarwanda*, Konkani*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Persian*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Quechua*, Scots*, Serbian*, Sindhi*, Sinhala*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Sotho*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Urdu*, Uyghur*, Uzbek*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Xhosa*, Yoruba*, Zulu*
